TCommand.CreateInvokable(string,string) Constructor

Summary

An invokable command is a special type of command than can be invoked on any object, even one that isn't a command target.

Namespace: Emetra.Command
Syntax
Delphi
public
 constructor CreateInvokable( const ATargetObject, AMethodName: string );

Parameters

ATargetObject
Type: string

The name of a RegisterAsCommandReceiver object upon which this command is to be applied.

AMethodName
Type: string

The method to invoke on this object.
